wikipedia_page.main: Piran Christopher Laity Holloway (born 1 October 1970) is an English former first-class cricketer.  Between 1988 and 2003, he appeared for Warwickshire and Somerset.  A left-handed batsman and wicket-keeper, Holloway made 14 appearances for England Under-19s.
